description: Enable and perform audits or scans of systems, permissions, insecure software, insecure configurations, etc. to identify potential weaknesses.(Citation: Brining MimiKatz to Unix) For example, use auditd to audit access to hashes, machine tickets, or /tmp files. If using sssd and Vintela, ensure kerberos is disabled if not being used.(Citation: audits linikatz)

external_references.description: Tim Wadhwa-Brown. (2018, November). Where 2 worlds collide Bringing Mimikatz et al to UNIX. Retrieved October 13, 2021.
